title: (x) Store for lease - Chalet 80 {Hrant, David Thometz}
content:
saw this in a store window in nyc -- have seen it before but never really found out what it's called. can anyone enlighten a beginner type lover?   
   
 ![Text Description](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518051603im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/1522.jpg)   
   
thanks guys!
author: folkert

comments.content:
Isn't it one of the Chalet fonts?   
Or maybe something else by House?   
 [http://www.houseind.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518051603/http:/www.houseind.com/)   
   
hhp

Yup. It looks like House's Chalet New York 80.   
   
David
yup, that seems to be it, thanks a ton guys!
